department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系客家社會及政策碩士班
department.en: Master Program of Hakka Social and Policy Sciences

goal.ch: 本課程主要是以質化研究理論與方法為經，以實務應用為緯，結合理論與實務。課程重點在質化研究之介紹、學習與能力培養，介紹社會科學較常使用的研究方法與瞭解如何進行研究，並培養四種基本能力：分析綜述力、反思批判力、共感共振力、實踐行動力。教學目標在於讓學生熟悉質化研究設計、方法、分析與策略，並將之應用於客家相關議題研究。課程的教學目標如下：（1）闡明質化研究的意義、特色、理論基礎、歷史發展，以及與量化研究的差異，讓學生了解質化研究的意涵與運用策略。（2）論述質化研究設計，建立概念架構，包括：研究計畫書的組成、研究主題、研究目的、研究問題與重要性，以及樣本的選取等，讓學生學習質化研究的設計內涵與應用。（3）透過質化研究資料蒐集方法與分析，包括：參與觀察、深度訪談、民族誌、建制民族誌、敘事分析，以及紮根理論等的認識，讓學生熟悉質化研究方法的應用與分析，採取質化研究作為客家研究與相關議題研究方法。
goal.en: This course primarily focuses on qualitative research theories and methods as its longitudinal framework, supplemented by practical applications as its latitudinal context, integrating theory and practice. The emphasis of the course is on introducing, learning, and skill development in qualitative research, presenting the commonly used research methodologies in social sciences, and understanding how to conduct research. The course aims to cultivate four fundamental skills: analytical synthesis, reflective critique, empathetic resonance, and practical action. The educational goals are to familiarize students with the design, methods, analysis, and strategies of qualitative research, and apply them to studies related to the Hakka issues. The teaching objectives of the course are as follows: (1) To elucidate the significance, characteristics, theoretical foundations, historical development, and differences from quantitative research of qualitative research, enabling students to understand the meanings and strategies of qualitative research. (2) To discuss the design of qualitative research, establish a conceptual framework, including the composition of a research proposal, research themes, objectives, questions, importance, and sample selection, thus teaching students the content and application of qualitative research design. (3) Through qualitative data collection methods and analysis, including participant observation, in-depth interviews, ethnography, institutional ethnography, narrative analysis, and grounded theory, the course allows students to become familiar with the applications and analyses of qualitative research methods, adopting qualitative research as a method for Hakka studies and related issues.

outline.ch:
第1週：課程介紹、研究設計：提問、方法與執行
第2週：族群資料的蒐集方法、趨勢與挑戰 /研究題目擬定、研究者定位
第3週：深度訪談法
第4週：民族誌、客家民族誌
第5週：客家民族誌田野、生命訪談
第6週：建制民族誌對客家研究啟發
第7週：紮根理論如何應用於客家研究
第8週：期中作業1：研究計畫書報告-繳交與報告
第9週：內容與文本分析、敘事研究與客家
第10週：運動會，全校停課。什麼是「問題意識」
第11週：期中作業2：相關論文分析-繳交與報告
第12週：研究執行：訪談與觀察
第13週：研究技法：田野筆記、備忘錄
第14週：研究整理：過錄、概念化
第15週：研究成果撰寫、研究倫理、APA格式
第16週：期末研究主題計劃書報告與回應
第17週：田野調查與諮詢
第18週：田野調查與諮詢
outline.en:
Here is the translation:
Week 1: Course Introduction, Research Design: Questions, Methods, and Execution
Week 2: Methods, Trends, and Challenges in Collecting Ethnic Group Data / Formulation of Research Topics, Researcher Positioning
Week 3: In-depth Interview Techniques
Week 4: Ethnography, Hakka Ethnography
Week 5: Hakka Ethnography Fieldwork, Life History Interviews
Week 6: Institutional Ethnography and Its Insights into Hakka Studies
Week 7: Application of Grounded Theory in Hakka Studies
Week 8: Midterm Assignment 1: Research Proposal Report - Submission and Presentation
Week 9: Content and Text Analysis, Narrative Research and the Hakka
Week 10: Sports Day, no classes school-wide. What is “Problem Awareness“?
Week 11: Midterm Assignment 2: Related Literature Analysis - Submission and Presentation
Week 12: Research Execution: Interviews and Observations
Week 13: Research Techniques: Field Notes, Memos
Week 14: Research Organization: Transcribing, Conceptualization
Week 15: Writing Research Findings, Research Ethics, APA Format
Week 16: Final Research Topic Proposal Report and Feedback
Week 17: Fieldwork and Consultation
Week 18: Fieldwork and Consultation

textbook.ch:
※瞿海源等主編，2012，《社會及行為科學研究法》（二）：質性研究法。台北：東華書局。
※張維安、潘美玲、許維德，2021，《客家與族群研究的技藝》。新竹：陽交大。
※陳向明，2011，《社會科學質的研究》。台北：五南。
textbook.en:
Qu, Haiyuan et al., eds. 2012. *Research Methods in Social and Behavioral Sciences* (Volume II): Qualitative Research Methods. Taipei: Donghua Book Company.

Zhang, Wei‘an, Pan, Meiling, ＆ Xu, Weide. 2021. *The Craft of Hakka and Ethnic Studies*. Hsinchu: National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University.

Chen, Xiangming. 2011. *Qualitative Research in Social Sciences*. Taipei: Wu-Nan Book Inc.

gradMethod.ch: 指定閱讀報告與討論30％、期中兩份作業30％、期末作業40％
gradMethod.en: Assigned Reading Reports and Discussion: 30％,Midterm Assignment: 30％, Final Assignment: 40％

flexDiscription.en: Independent Study, Schedule a Discussion Time

ch.competencies: 獨立思考與反思批判能力

en.competencies: 獨立思考與反思批判能力
